generalInstructions: Please read the following instructions carefully before starting the examination.
timeManagementPoints: The total duration of the examination is fixed and will not be extended under any circumstances.
A timer will be displayed on the screen showing the remaining time.
The exam will be automatically submitted once the time is over.
examRulesPoints: Each question has only one correct answer.
Do not refresh the page or press the back button during the exam.
Any attempt to open another tab or application may lead to disqualification.
Ensure a stable internet connection throughout the exam.
Your responses will be saved automatically.
agreementText: I have read and understood all the instructions.
